mapper.sql: id, pid, date, count, did, status
mapper.select: select t.*, pr.id as prid,pr.name as prname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from productraw_in t left outer join productrawinfo pr on t.pid = pr.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did = de.id left outer join unit u on pr.gu = u.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select t.*, pr.id as prid,pr.name as prname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from productraw_in t left outer join productrawinfo pr on t.pid = pr.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did = de.id left outer join unit u on pr.gu = u.id where t.status=0 and pr.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" order by t.date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select t.*, pr.id as prid,pr.name as prname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from productraw_in t left outer join productrawinfo pr on t.pid = pr.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did = de.id left outer join unit u on pr.gu = u.id where t.status=0 order by t.date desc
limit ${offset}, ${pageSize}

select t.*, pr.id as prid,pr.name as prname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from productraw_in t left outer join productrawinfo pr on t.pid = pr.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did = de.id left outer join unit u on pr.gu = u.id where t.pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0 order by t.date desc
select count(*) from productraw_in t left outer join productrawinfo pr on t.pid = pr.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did = de.id where pr.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0
select count(*) from productraw_in where status=0
mapper.insert: insert into productraw_in (id, pid, date, count, did, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productRaw.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{count,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
